features: NATURAL & ORGANIC INGREDIENTS: Mielle Organics Pomegranate & Honey Moisturizing and Detangling Shampoo fuses pomegranate extract, honey, babassu oil, silk protein, and other natural, restorative ingredients to moisturize and strengthen curly hair

GENTLE CLEANSING FORMULA: Our weightless, nutrient-rich shampoo is an invigorating cleanser that can smooth and soothe dry and damaged hair instantly without weighing it down or leaving behind a dulling residue

TACKLE TOUGH TANGLES: This daily replenishing shampoo quenches even the unruliest Type 4 hair, taming stubborn tangles, frizzy hair, and flyaways while defining coily or curly hair for bouncy, shiny locks and long-lasting hydration

EASY TO USE: Our deep moisture cleanser is gentle enough for daily use, deeply penetrating colored or damaged hair for visibly improved texture; Apply and lather then finger comb, rinse, and condition for soft, manageable hair and damage repair

BY WOMEN FOR WOMEN: Mielle Organics aims to empower women of all hair types and styles with powerful products and gentle, organic ingredients that amplify your natural beauty and are the “root to results” that leave you looking and feeling your best

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Type 4 Ladies — this one’s for you! Give your curls some love with Mielle’s pomegranate and honey collection! Our Curl Smoothie is made to provide moisture and strength with natural ingredients like pomegranate extract, honey, and babassu oil, and using it is simple. Just apply this hair serum to your hair from root to tip, give a little extra love and attention to problem areas, and style! It brings life to damaged hair and it smells great. When you’re looking for Type 4 hair products, you know that Mielle has exactly what you need. Try it for yourself and see why our natural hair-styling products have taken the world of beauty by storm!

Pomegranate & Honey Conditioner Pomegranate & Honey Curl Refresher Spray Pomegranate & Honey Curl Smoothie Pomegranate & Honey Coil Sculpting Custard Pomegranate & Honey Leave-in Conditioner Moisture/Hydrates ✓ ✓ ✓ Achieve shiny, smooth-to-the-touch hair ✓ ✓ ✓ Prevents or helps with breakage ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Defines Curl ✓ ✓ Hair Type Type 4 Thick, curly hair Thick, curly hair Type 4 Thick, curly hair Size 12 fl. oz. 8 fl. oz. 12 fl. oz. 2 oz. 12 fl. oz.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Shampoo EVER!
reviews.reviewText: This by far is the best shampoo I've ever used! It smells SO good and feels so soft! My hair has never looked or felt so good! Honestly this product line can be used for straight or curly hair. My hair is naturally curly, but I prefer to wear it straight. I have this shampoo, conditioner, and the leave in conditioner of the same line. I highly recommend you buy this. You will not regret it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My hair thick and Naturally curly -my hair was shining , healthy- looked beautiful after blowing it out

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars From 4 stars to 5 stars! Impressive! Cleans exceptionally well without leaving any residue!
reviews.reviewText: October 5, 2023 UPDATE: Previously I had given this shampoo four stars because in spite of all its great qualities it dried out my hair a teeny tiny bit. But then I discovered when I used it with Baja Basics Hair Growth Elixir Rice Water detangling hydrating spray leave in hair conditioner, my hair became lustrous and just within two weeks of using the rice water conditioning spray hair, about 1/4 inches long hair sprouted all over my head! The baby hairs were noticeable in the big ALMOST bald spot I had in the crown area from wearing a sunhat everyday for 15 years. Yes, the hat stopped hair growth in my experience. Within four weeks the combination of this shampoo and the Baja Basics rice water hair growth conditioner caused the baby hairs to grow to half an inch length. I wanted people to know what happened as a result of the hair growth conditioner and this shampoo so I left a review about this shampoo on the hair growth conditioner/elixir on that site. Then I thought there might be people here on this shampoo site that are struggling with thinning hair so I am leaving information about that hair growth elixir here. I feel truly fortunate to come across two super stars products that work exceptionally well together. And to top it off both products are really reasonably priced. The Baja Basics hair growth elixir rice water hydration spray that is a leave in conditioner is only $14.95 for 4 fluid ounces, The ingredients are spectacular! Rice water, rose water, glycerin, D panthenol (wonderful, gentle for hair growth), Vitamin B5, Vitamin C, aloe vera, sorbic acid, MSM. Vitamins superb for hair growth and health. They worked for me beyond my wishes, I know you will benefit from them, also. Good health and beauty to you!First review is below ***************Because there is no sticky residue to weigh the hair downI, this shampoo gives superb body. Why I am not giving it 5 stars is because it dries out the hair a little bit. I will include this shampoo in my routine hair care, but I am still on the search for a shampoo that will clean well without drying out my hair.One side note: There is another plus to using this shampoo. It will cut out itchy scalp. The ingredients are so clean that the scalp is cleaned well, too, not just the hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The product itself is good. My locs feel a little softer. The knob on the sprayer part of the bottle is a pain since it keeps sliding closed as I’m trying to spray my locs. They need to fix that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommend this product
reviews.reviewText: Both shampoo and conditioner smell so good and leap your hair incredibly soft. First time using and I’m hooked and will continue to purchase to use for my daughters 4C hair!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like the brand
reviews.reviewText: I've been using some of these products for a while and saw the shampoo and conditioner on Amazon for a better price. The shampoo pump broke after me, trying to open it to use. I'll just have to buy it at Sally beauty. I have high porosity hair and the twisting souffle helps to hydrate my hair. The rosemary mint scalp and hair I use this every other day. Thanks Mielle for being concerned about a customer who uses you products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Like the other review that I did for Mielle products this is top-of-the-line. On Black Friday and a couple days after if you went on Mielle‘s website, you got all of their products for seven dollars. I just so happen to already have these products at home already that I’ve ordered from Amazon, the products are fantastic. I ordered the products that they have for 4C hair. They have other products for other types of hair but the one for 4C hair works for me just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Shampoo came with broken lid.
reviews.reviewText: I really like the product. It smells amazing and leaves my 4b/c hair soft and manageable. The reason I only gave 3 stars was because the product came damaged and there was shampoo all over the bag.

This helped with my flakey dry scalp. I've tried head&shoulders, tea tree shampoos & conditioners and apple cider vinegar rinses. Didn't work or just irritated my scalp. Black hair care Youtuber's recommended this for 4c hair. Glad I found it. I use this in conjunction with their other two hair care products. So far so good.

reviews.reviewTitle: Sehr zufrieden und riecht sehr gut
reviews.reviewText: Es ist für die schöne locken meines Sohns! Wir sind zufrieden!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the smell of it, it also left my hair feeling soft and manageable. You can detangle your hair without struggle with this as well all around a good product for natural hair especially if you are 4c
